EatOatmeal.title: Eat Oatmeal
EatOatmeal.description: This is the most tasteless food on the planet, nothing worse has happened to you in your entire life. You ate oatmeal

EatApple.title: Eat Apple
EatApple.description: With words from the meme 'Hey, apple!' you eat poor fruit. Not so bad! You ate apple

EatSalat.title: Eat Salat
EatSalat.description: Mom always made you eat all the vegetables. You hate vegetables, but you love your mom. You ate salat

EatSoup.title: Eat Soup
EatSoup.description: Soup is a infernal cauldron for vegetables. Live with this thought now. You ate soup

EatSandwich.title: Eat Sandwich
EatSandwich.description: They say that a sandwich always falls butter down. It's time to find out if this is the case? You ate sandwich

EatPizza.title: Eat Pizza
EatPizza.description: Pizza! Oh Lord, there is nothing better in this world! You ate pizza

EatDoritos.title: Eat Doritos
EatDoritos.description: Covered in fat and crumbs, well-fed and happy! It is unhealthy, but who cares? You ate Doritos

EatDriedPizzaSides.title: Eat dried pizza sides
EatDriedPizzaSides.description: How long are they here? Maybe a day, maybe an eternity. It looks like you have no other choice. You ate dried pizza sides

EatCrumbs.title: Eat crumbs from the keyboard
EatCrumbs.description: Yes, you seem to be in despair. But as Mr.T said: Life's tough, but I'm tougher! You ate crumbs from the keyboard

takeANap.title: Take a nap
takeANap.description: Wake me up when september ends! You take a nap

goSleep.title: Go to sleep
goSleep.description: Sleep, eat, play games all day, repeat! You go to sleep

drinkHolyWater.title: Drink holy water
drinkHolyWater.description: You feel the divine light shining on you! You drink holy water

drinkTea.title: Drink tea
drinkTea.description: Oh, are you from England? Yeah, sure, me too! You drink tea

drinkCoffee.title: Drink coffe
drinkCoffee.description: Finally, something that really gives energy! Do stupid things faster! You drink coffee

drinkRedBull.title: Drink red bull
drinkRedBull.description: Red Bull gives wings. Be careful, Icarus! You drink Red Bull

drinkFewRedBulls.title: Drink few red bull
drinkFewRedBulls.description: And by FEW I mean everything within a radius of 30 km! You drink all the Red Bulls

PowerNature.title: Power of nature
PowerNature.description: You ask for strength from mother earth. And since no one has spoken to her for a long time, she gladly shares her strength with you.

ConnectCollider.title: Connect to android collider
ConnectCollider.description: Pretty crazy idea, considering that it accelerates particles, and doesn't generate energy. But it will suit you anyway.

BlackHole.title: Take the energy of the black hole in space
BlackHole.description: And put it in the Dota game! Ultimate!

watchAnime.title: Watch anime
watchAnime.description: Omae wa mou shindeiru, s-senpai! You watch anime

watchNetflix.title: Watch Netflix
watchNetflix.description: Netflix - see what's next! And then next. And next. And save me somebody! You watch Netflix all day

walkWithFriends.title: Hang with Friends
walkWithFriends.description: You are a cyber athlete, you have no friends. Imaginary don't count! You hang with somebody for a while

doSomeHobby.title: You have some hobby?
doSomeHobby.description: For many, many tedious and grueling hours, you ... glue a model airplane! What a party!

drinkJuice.title: Drink juice
drinkJuice.description: Juice is the blood of fruits. Live with this thought now. You drink juice

drinkTapWater.title: Drink tap water
drinkTapWater.description: I don’t know why you did it. It doesn't do anything. You drink tap water

drinkBeer.title: Drink beer
drinkBeer.description: Oh, wow, here's where to start esport career! Now you don't even want to play anymore. Let's just chill, man. You drink beer

drinkVodka.title: Drink vodka
drinkVodka.description: Matryoshka, balalaika! Wait, where is my bear? You drink vodka

drinkRedBullVodka.title: Red Bull with vodka
drinkRedBullVodka.description: Seriously? At this time of day? Are you planning on playing games at all? Jesus! You drink red bull with vodka

drinkBrakeFluid.title: Drink brake fluid
drinkBrakeFluid.description: Nobody knows what will happen if you drink this. Imagine that you are Alice in Wonderland! You drink brake fluid

playFortnite.title: Play Fortnite
playFortnite.description: Ninja is a noob! I once killed him with a bow! I swear!

playOverWatch.title: Play OverWatch
playOverWatch.description: You seem familiar. Ain’t I killed you before?

playPubg.title: Play Pubg
playPubg.description: Find a pan, boy. Just. Find. A pan.

playSC2.title: Play StarCraft 2
playSC2.description: The Protos are so OP! So let's play for them. Hope this guy is not from Korea.

playHeartStone.title: Play HeartStone
playHeartStone.description: It's just a card game, what can be difficult here? Right? RIGHT?

playFifa.title: Play Fifa
playFifa.description: Yes, yes, I know. This stupid game just doesn't want you to score! Maybe you better just play career mode only?

playMK.title: Play Mortal Combat
playMK.description: Wait, don't hit! Let me try something!

playSkyrim.title: Play Skyrim
playSkyrim.description: Dovahkiin, do you even know that this is a single player game? It is contraindicated for esportsmens

playHeroes.title: Play the best game in history! Almighty Heroes of Might and Magic III
playHeroes.description: Astrologers proclaim the week of the old school games. Your procrastination doubles!

playSonic.title: Play Sonic the hedgehog
playSonic.description: Make yourself comfortable, kids. Now I will tell you a story about the true lord of the rings (at 16 bit)

playMario.title: Play Mario
playMario.description: Sorry Mario, but your princess is in another castle! She's always in another castle.

playTetris.title: Play Tetris
playTetris.description: Just blow the dust off this and put it back

playDead.title: Play Dead
playDead.description: Just lie on the floor all day and think about what you're doing with your life.

DoSomeExercise.title: Do Some Exercise
DoSomeExercise.description: Girls love athletic guys. Girls? Have you ever heard of them, cyber athlete?

takeSomeMedicine.title: Take some medicine
takeSomeMedicine.description: Snatch a couple of pills from your older brother. Thank me later.

goSeeDoctor.title: Go see a doctor
goSeeDoctor.description: But be careful: if the doctor is overly sarcastic, has a cane, and seems to have used something - you'd better go home!

DeepBreath.title: Deep Breath
DeepBreath.description: Breath... Everything will gona be okey... Just breath...

CallMama.title: Call Mama
CallMama.description: She will blow where it hurts, and everything will pass! You will see, this is the most powerful treatment in your arsenal.

JustEndure.title: Just endure
JustEndure.description: The universe is amazed at your resilience and obstinacy! You restore some health as a sign of respect!

HealthPotion.title: Health Potion
HealthPotion.description: All games have it, so it should be in this one too! Drink it!

ManaPotion.title: Mana Potion
ManaPotion.description: I don’t know why it’s here, it won’t help with your health. But it won't hurt either! Drink it!

StimpakFallout.title: Stimpak from Fallout
StimpakFallout.description: War... War is never change. But this thing will bring you back to life even in the nuclear desert

Pray.title: Pray
Pray.description: If nothing else remains. Pray. Maybe Lord is the only one who can improve your skillz
